name: Toaster Mania
description:
Toaster Mania It was a normal day in the kitchen when, suddenly, the power cable
disconnected from the kitchen toaster.
What a disaster. You must control the cable, navigate through the
many obstacles lurking in the kitchen and solve challenging puzzles 
in order to connect to the toaster. 

Credits
